The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
'''Inklings''' can refer to:

==Real-world==
*The '''[[Inklings]]''', a literary group which included [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]].
*[[:Category:Inklings|Category:Inklings]], listing people associated with the Inklings.
*[[The Founders' Inklings]], podcast produced by  [[Middle-earth Network|Middle-earth Network Radio]].

==Publications==
===Books===
*'''''[[The Inklings (book)|The Inklings: C.S. Lewis, J.R.R. Tolkien, Charles Williams and Their Friends]]''''', a [[1978]] book by [[Humphrey Carpenter]].
*[[The Inklings of Oxford]], a [[2009]] book by Harry Lee Poe.
*''[[Inklings: Jahrbuch für Literatur und Ästhetik]]'', a bi-lingual (German/English) journal.
*''[[The Inklings Handbook|The Inklings Handbook: The Lives, Thought and Writings of C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, Charles Williams, Owen Barfield, and Their Friends]]'', a [[2001]] book by [[Colin Duriez]] and David Porter.
*''[[Myth and Magic: Art according to the Inklings]]'', a [[2007]] book in the ''[[Cormarë Series]]''.
===Calendars===
*''[[Inklings Calendar 1986]]''
*''[[Inklings Calendar 1990]]''

==Adaptations==
* The '''Inklings''', an imaginary group of Hobbit-authors that appears only in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.
